name: Hatamari
description:
Hatamari

You are a sea urchin. Gather hats to protect yourself from predators. Your goal is to find a big enough crab so that you yourself may become a hat.

Controls:

Move: A or D, Arrow Keys, or Left Stick

Jump: W, Space, Up Arrow, or A button

Duck: S, Down Arrow, Left Stick Down

Inspiration:

A twitter post about sea urchins.

A national geographic article about crabs.

Credits:

By Coby West

Hat contributions from Rachel Stucky and Johnathan Levine.

Special thanks to the Fantastic Arcade discord for turning me onto these cool critters.

Music attribution: The Cynic Project / cynicmusic.com / pixelsphere.org

Font attribution: https://www.dafont.com/nice-sugar.font (Suggested by Dylan Ilvento)
